name: workflows.triggers.permissions.remove
desc: Revoke an entity's access to a trigger that has its permission type set to named_entities

errors.access_denied: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
errors.connected_org_denied: The workspace admin does not allow connected organizations to be named_entities.
errors.connected_team_denied: The workspace admin does not allow connected teams to be named_entities.
errors.connected_user_denied: The workspace admin does not allow connected users to be named_entities.
errors.named_entities_cannot_be_empty: There must be at least one valid named entity
errors.org_not_connected: One of more of the listed organizations were not connected.
errors.org_not_found: One or more of the listed organizations could not be found.
errors.shared_channel_denied: The workspace admin does not allow shared channels to be named_entities.
errors.invalid_permission_type: This trigger requires permission_type to be set as named_entities before adding users.
errors.too_many_named_entities: Too many named entities passed into the trigger permissions setting.
